channel.title: ReminiscePS.Com - Community Driven - OSRS - Wildy Bosses - Economy Server
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://reminisceps.com"] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fvcPgKB.png[/img] [SIZE=5]Click logo to head to forums[/SIZE] [/URL] [SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS][COLOR="#FFFFFF"] About Reminisce[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#D3D3D3"][SIZE=4]Reminisce is a community-driven Oldschool Private Server that not only wants to create a fun gaming experience but also make it a home for everyone to enjoy and impact the server how they would like. No updates (other than what's necessary) will be going through Reminisce without a community-voted poll, and will have to receive majority vote in order to be added by our developers. We ensure you no dumb updates that you wouldn't like into the server. This is an oldschool server, nothing but uniqueness and non-torvaness will be on this server.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[/FONT]
[SPOILER=images] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img1.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img18.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img3.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img4.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img5.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img6.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img7.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img8.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img9.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img10.png[/img] [[IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img11.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img12.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img13.png[/img] [[IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img14.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img15.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img16.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img17.png[/img] [IMG]http://reminisceps.com/img/img19.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: ReminiscePS.Com - Community Driven - OSRS - Wildy Bosses - Economy Server
item.dc:creator: @Retaliate Retaliate
item.description:
@Retaliate wrote:

Bumping Reminisce! Super fun old school server with very qualified developers. They are shooting out constant updates for the players and it is just a blast! Come check it out and check it out the new forums!

http://reminisceps.com/smf/

Read full topic
item.source: ReminiscePS.Com - Community Driven - OSRS - Wildy Bosses - Economy Server
